text: Hellohello. I've been a bit of a Julia lurker and dabbler, but recently decided to take it seriously. I'm broadly interested in stochastic processes, dynamical systems and machine learning. Especially the intersection of these, with applications to systems biology. I've really enjoyed my first dabbles with the SciML ecosystem. I'm also a wannabe Lisper, and I hear Julia's good for scratching that kind of itch.

text: thanks! really appreciate the effort you and your collaborators have put into the DifferentialEquations.jl ecosystem. it nails the abstractions to the right level IMO.
